name: Physics Lab
description:
Welcome To Physics Lab, We Appreciate Your Interest In Testing With Us Today!

What Is Physics Lab
Physics Lab Is A Small Sandbox Game Where Players Have Multiple Labs To Play Around In, Each Lab Is Different With Different Physics Based Objects And Features, You Will Find Almost Anything Can Be Picked Up!

Alpha Point Lab
Alpha Point Lab Is A Physics Lab Which Focuses On Slides And Objects, In This Lab You'll Be Able To Throw Objects You Pick Up At The Wall Or Other Objects And Travel Down A Slide With Or Without Objects!

Beta Point Lab
Beta Point Lab Is A Physics Lab That Focuses On Balance Platforms, Jump Pads And Wall Running, In This Lab You'll Be Able To Wall Run Across The Lab, Jump At New Heights Or Send Objects To New Heights And Balance On Physics Based Platforms!

Charlie Point Lab
Charlie Point Lab Is A Physics Lab That Focuses On Dropping Objects On Giant Ramps, In This Lab You'll Be Able To Choose What Type Of Ramp You Want To Use And Slide Down It With Or Without Objects!
